author: dims
msg: Added view-source facility to most of the XSP driven pages. This will enable
users (read beginners) to quickly view the sample XSP sources.

author: dims
msg: Display Sitemap compilation errors on screen. (without needing to dig into cocoon.log)

author: dims
msg: #1. Added JTidy from http://sourceforge.net/projects/jtidy/. This can be used
to scrape content from external HTML sources.
#2. Added samples of displaying custom versions of News pages from
Please make sure that your proxy is set when running your servlet engine.
